ai-tha-ap275:1.3_0: After going out to meet him,
ai-tha-ap275:2.3_0: and given a blossoming fragrant water.
ai-tha-ap275:2.4_0: I’ll rejoice in heaven for an eon.’
ai-tha-ap275:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap275:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap275:3.4_0: this fruit is the very shopkeeper.
ai-tha-ap275:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Piṅgiyānī.
ai-tha-ap275:6.1_0: Third to the third Elder Caṅkicca
